name: CreateRelease
description: Creates new release as part of current release pipe line
author: Ihor Venzhyk

inputs.name: LinkedReleaseDefinitionVSTSConnectedServiceName
inputs.label: VSTS endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: Generic Service Connection to current instance of VSTS. (https://<InstanceName>.vsrm.visualstudio.com/<ProjectName>/)

inputs.name: LinkedReleaseDefinition
inputs.label: Linked Release Definition
inputs.helpMarkDown: Pick release that should be created

inputs.name: LinkedReleaseDefinitionEnvironment
inputs.label: Envronment
inputs.helpMarkDown: Pick envronment for deployment. For all other environments trigger will be changed from automated to manual.

inputs.name: artifactsSource
inputs.label: Where to get artifacts for new release
inputs.helpMarkDown: You can either use latest artifacts version from linked release definition or pick artifacts from current release definition, matching it by name (artifact alias)

inputs.name: releaseDescription
inputs.label: Release Description
inputs.helpMarkDown: This text will be added to Release Description

inputs.name: waitForLinkedRelease
inputs.label: Wait linked release finish
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Wait until linked release finish and check its status. If linked release has failed, fail current release too. 

 ** NB! Task will wait until child release finish and keep agent queue slot. If the same agent serves both releases, this option might couse deadlock! **

inputs.name: LinkedReleaseWaitTimeout
inputs.label: Timeout (minutes)
inputs.helpMarkDown: If linked release doesn't finish after timeout, treat it as failure

inputs.name: slidingTimeoutForLinkedRelease
inputs.label: Double timeout if linked release is in progress
